## Convergence of CDFs

Suppose that $X_1, X_2, ... \overset{iid}{\sim} Uniform(0, 1)$, $X_{(n)} = \max\{X_1,...,X_n\}$, and let

$Y_n = n(1 - X_{(n)})$.


1. Find the cdf $F_{Y_n}(t) = P(Y_n \leq t)$.

\vspace{4cm}

2. Using question 1, and the fact that $\lim \limits_{n \to \infty} \left(1 + \frac{x}{n} \right)^n = e^{x}$, show that for any given $t$, $F_{Y_n}(t) \to 1 - e^{-t}$.
